alert_create_highlight_in_editable.message: Unable to create a highlight within an editable text box.

alert_create_highlight_in_subframe.message: Creating a highlight within a subframe of a page is currently unsupported.

confirm_remove_all_highlights.message: Are you sure you wish to remove every highlight on this page?

confirm_remove_all_pages.message: This operation can't be undone. Are you sure you wish to remove every highlight on every page?

confirm_remove_style.message: This operation can't be undone. Are you sure you wish to remove this style?

confirm_reset_default_styles.message: This operation can't be undone. Are you sure you wish to restore the default styles?

advanced_database_export_description.message: Saves a file containing every highlight appearance and style currently in the database. If you haven't enabled the 'Ask where to save each file before downloading' option in Chrome, the file will probably be saved in your Downloads folder.

advanced_database_heading.message: Experimental - use at your own risk (or at least test it beforehand)

advanced_database_import_description.message: Replace all current highlight and styles with those previously exported into a file. NOTE: ALL existing highlights on ALL pages will be replaced, along with ALL modified highlight styles.

advanced_header.message: Caution! Functions in this section should be considered experimental, and subject to change or removal in the future. Don't say you weren't warned...

extension_description.message: Adds highlights to text on web pages, and tries to restore them on subsequent visits.

highlight_help_keyboard_shortcut.message: A keyboard shortcut can be assigned to any of the first 10 styles. Use the 'Keyboard Shortcuts' facility, located in Chrome's 'Extensions' page (also accessible via the 'More Tools' section of the main menu).

libraries.message: This extension is composed of the following libraries

options_tab_page_header_sites.message: Choose a style to change its title and appearance

page_action_title_not_in_dom.message: Some highlights couldn't be restored onto this page

pages_empty.message: Nothing to see here, move along

tooltip_copy_highlight.message: Copy the highlighted text to the Clipboard

warning_file_access_required.message: NB: This is an offline page (stored locally in a file). The highlights it contains can only be shown if 'Allow access to file URLs' is enabled for this extension. You may choose to do this via the 'Extensions' tool page.

untitled_page_group_tooltip.message: Pages for which the title has not yet been obtained, or is not specified.
